CSSPrimitiveValueGetRectValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The getRectValue() method of the
interface is used to get a rect value. If this CSS
value doesn't contain a rect value, a is raised.
Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the
interface.

blockquote.para:
This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSPrimitiveValueGetRectValue.returns: A object representing the rect value.
